definitions.title: 1. f.
definitions.body: Athaliah, daughter of Ahab and Jezebel, mother of Ahaziah king of Judah; Goqolia: [[יׇהוּ]]- 2Ki 8:26, 2Ki 11:2, 2Ki 11:20 = 2Ch 22:2, 2Ch 22:10, 2Ch 22:11, 2Ch 23:12, 2Ch 23:13, 2Ch 23:21, 2Ch 24:7; [[יׇה]]- 2Ki 11:1, 2Ki 11:3, 2Ki 11:13, 2Ki 11:14, 2Ch 22:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Ezr 8:7 Aqelei, A Aqlia; LXXL Goqoni/ou (genit.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַתְלָָי]] one with foreign wife Ezr 10:28, Qali, A Oqali.
